name: Chill Beatz Bro
description:
My entry for

SUMMER 32-Bit Game Jam

Hosted by PandamedicGames

~

(Bug found: keyboard does not appear when typing name in the Design your character scene. Temporary fix: use the desktop version until I can upload a fix)

Removed username option. Tried looking for keyboard fixes but none of them worked or they crashed. Sorry.

~

Theme: 😎Chilled/Relaxed😎

Create a game with a chilled or relaxed atmosphere!!

~

BurterButterBeans Studio presents

Chill Beatz Bro!

Create a custom character, customize your house, click on musical notes, buy furniture upgrades, listen to 5 awesome songs by Kevin MacLeod.

Available for Windows, Mac, Android and WebGL

Auto-saving included!
